Notes.Text:
This update for xmlgraphics-batik fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2019-17566: Fixed a SSRF which might have allowed the underlying server to make arbitrary GET requests (bsc#1172961).
Notes.Title: Details

Notes.Text: The CVRF data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution for Non-Commercial usage (CC-BY-NC-4.0).
Notes.Title: Terms of Use

Relationships.RelatesToProductReference: SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 12 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 12 SP5

Vulnerabilities.Description: Apache Batik is vulnerable to server-side request forgery, caused by improper input validation by the "xlink:href" attributes. By using a specially-crafted argument, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the underlying server to make arbitrary GET requests.

ProductID: SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 12 SP4:xmlgraphics-batik-1.8-3.3.1
